summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6201 for the improvement of The Alley in Lockmore Addition Number 3, being the alley between 27th Avenue South and 28th Avenue South from Hudson Street to Dawson Street; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 88221, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
